website_summaries.verdict: A great price for a quality enzyme-based product if your baby is sensitive to fragrances or cleaning agents.
pros: This formula is fragrance free, which is great for babies with sensitivities
Babies with sensitive skin, allergies, or eczema will appreciate the gentle formula without phthalates and dyes
As an Amazon brand, many users trust its quality even at the low price
cons: Some users state their clothes don't smell clean since it doesn't leave any fragrance

customer_reviews.title: Works better than competition
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how soft these made my clothes. We were using seventh gen free and clear laundry detergent, and we didn't dislike it, but this stuff deals with stains better, leaves clothes softer, and leaves clothes smelling better. All without sacrificing on how gentle it is, which is important since my baby and I both have extremely sensitive skin, and I have a sensitive nose. It also works well for pre-treating clothes with stains, though it can be a bit messy since you have to pour some out and rub it in.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, effective on cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: My baby has very sensitive skin and we use cloth diapers. I needed something gentle, fragrance free, no chemicals, and still strong enough to keep her diapers clean. This detergent does it! Her sensitive skin is unbothered and her diapers come out clean no matter what they looked like going in.
customer_reviews.author: Stef Nevells

customer_reviews.title: Not full size
customer_reviews.text: I feel the price is a bit much, I was honestly expecting 2 full size bottles, they were 2 very small bottles, but I must have not read the description correctly. These came in handy, especially when I purchased them when everyone was panic buying everything from the stores. I wish they came in a pack of full size. But in all it was a good product. It is wonderful for sensitive skin. And the bottle is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana R.

customer_reviews.title: A valiant effort, but falls a bit short on stains
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine, but didn't remove stains from the babies clothing compared to some other options we've tried. I appreciate that there are minimal chemicals in it, but we found an alternative that just frankly worked better for those tougher stains.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey L. Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: Nice detergent
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain about this. It works well. I like the unscented for my kids with sensitive skin. I also like the size of the bottle - it makes it easy to handle! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing this product, I read the reviews about amazing properties of this item. Perhaps it does wash all stains out but it also fades clothes. I washed my newborn clothes he has never worn and they look like have been used. The clothes were stiff too. I’m not very happy with this product and have to look for something else that keeps clothes clean yet in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After having our first born I have become way more cautious to what we put in and on our bodies. Hence us ordering Mama bear laundry detergent. It works so well to get stains out and tough enough to use on our clothes... not just baby's. I bought this a month or two ago and wash clothes twice a week (all day) and barely done with the first tub if it. Worth the money and the trial run.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby's sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: We've used washable diapers with my 16-month old since day one. This detergent was the best for her sensitive skin when she was an infant. We eventually had to switch to something with a stronger scent for the diapers as she got older and her smells became more intense, but this detergent kept her diapers clean and stain free for the first 9 months and she never, ever had a diaper rash. It's also great for cleaning baby clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sabo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Multiple chemical and inhaled irritant sensitivities.
customer_reviews.text: Multiple chemical and inhaled irritant sensitivities. This laundry product has worked very well for me
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: The only detergent I have been using for 2 years now
customer_reviews.text: The only detergent I use for my 5m and 2y old kids. And I am happy with how it cleans the clothes. Nice scent also. Very light!
customer_reviews.author: LadyOlgaRus

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent as much as honest company but for a better price. Highly recommend for baby’s sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and no scent
customer_reviews.text: So happy I went with this product. There isn’t a smell to the detergent and my baby has not had any reaction to it. Plus we’ve been having the washer machine on basically 24/7 for the last week and we are still on the first bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Missaymoo

customer_reviews.title: Meh... it’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t blown away. It cleaned my clothes, the scent was okay, the price was good, but it didn’t always stand up to stain prevention the way a toddler requires. I went back to Dapple. It’s more expensive, but I’ve never found another detergent near as good.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Used for baby’s new clothes before arrival
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first time mom and bought this to wash baby’s clothes before she arrives. I was looking for something gentle and fragrance free, but also with good ingredients. This did the job and all my baby’s clothes held up well. I was scared washing would make the clothes look worn out and it did not!
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Good scent but apply more
customer_reviews.text: Have a different options cheaper and super concentrated but choosed this to try. Great scent, but must apply more than a cup to wash it good.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure about it. It doesn't have a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about it. It doesn't have a scent so I can't tell if it really washed. I don't think I'll buy it again. I also dont trust that the lesser amount (concentrated) really works so I just end up putting double.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic , no scent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, my newborn seemed content, no reactions.
customer_reviews.author: DiablaAndy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase to use for little ones as opposed to pricey name brands
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love this detergent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wash all my baby's clothes with. It works great and it a good value! I am happy with this detergent and how it gets everything clean!
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite. This detergent doesn't seem to be any different than regular detergent. Doesn't have much of a scent, which could be a pro or con.
customer_reviews.author: L. White

customer_reviews.title: Works for very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because we all have sensitive skin in my house and can't use detergents and so either I buy dreft or make my own. Now I can buy this without breaking the budgets
customer_reviews.author: PbnJprincess

customer_reviews.title: Washes the clothes
customer_reviews.text: Dislike smell very much... I love the smell of dreft. But washes clothes so I cant really complain
customer_reviews.author: AdiAmb11

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to detergent
customer_reviews.text: Great unscented eco friendly (I think) detergent. Works well. I was buying dapple detergent, gave this a try and is great. Cheaper too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Washes well
customer_reviews.text: This washes very well but why the bearly blossom scent do not have sbscribe option ? Please have it eligible for subscribe program
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Sensitive, and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Love that this laundry detergent is so concentrated that the tiny, light bottle provides for many loads. The clothes all come out smelling, looking, and feeling clean. The price is great for the product you receive. Also, no issues with any of the skin disorders within my household.
customer_reviews.author: bettylewwho

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like It. It is gentle on my baby’s clothes and there are no harsh scents. I highly Recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: similar quality to seventh generation.
customer_reviews.text: great product. similar to quality as seventh generation. really happy with product. scent free.
customer_reviews.author: maybreeze01

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I thought it would be for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Pershall

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt smell really good for baby's detergent. Works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Unscented and after to use for baby! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wen H

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described, no fragrances, doesn't cause any allergic reactions as some detergents do, although it could be better when it comes to removing some stains - although I wouldn't expect too much.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: Works well on the baby clothes and really doesn’t have a scent to it 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Francetic

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and Safe, good for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gentle detergent. It’s eco friendly and gentle enough for my babies sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E.

customer_reviews.title: Really Cleans
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Clothes are actually clean, no fragrance, and safe for baby. One less thing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Books & Pens

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, the detergent had leaked all over the box, which was disheartening and gross. They may need to examine the packaging. The soap seems to be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Nyc

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye TIDE!
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as Tide, and we are no longer wearing chemicals on our skin! Get your kids clothes off of these harmful chemicals. I think what we eat and wear can make us ill . Fight back !
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Newborn will have clean clothes and sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my granddaughter who is having a baby!
customer_reviews.author: sherwon frederick

customer_reviews.title: Gets out the strongest odor stains... even Cat urine!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! We actually used this on a batch of our own clothes that had been peed on by our cats. After using 5 Tide pods over two washes with a strong odor still on the clothes, this was the only other detergent we had on hand and tried it It worked AMAZINGLY well!! The clothes were perfect! We then used this detergent in a bathtub to clean the suitcase the cats peed in - totally clean without leeching out the color! We are definitely fans of this detergent, and use it to clean everything for our kids - from clothes to strollers to carseats!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Kulangara

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my preferred baby laundry detergent. I've tried other popular brands such as Attitude, but I didn't like the thick consistencies. Mama Bear the best so far. :)
customer_reviews.author: CKim

customer_reviews.title: Beats the leading national brand - excellent soap!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our daughter and son-in-law to use for their brand new baby. They love this detergent. No scent. No residue. Just clean baby clothes! They use it a couple times each day and are still on the first bottle. It really lasts - and it really works. We are SOLD!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Young

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and the smell is not too harsh for my baby
customer_reviews.author: Berry

customer_reviews.title: Fine for everyday, less so bad messes
customer_reviews.text: The average load of baby stuff washed just fine - but anything from super messy days (sloppy foods or diaper fails) had to be washed multiple times before stains would be removed
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Eden

customer_reviews.title: Nice and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves clothes feeling and smelling clean. Doesn't feel like residue is still on clothes after washing them like some detergents.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: so someone recommended this detergent to me
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin, so someone recommended this detergent to me. It is ok, but for the price I can get better detergent locally.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Different usage but it does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to wash my BiPap sleep apnea mask and headgear.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Tissier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well and is quite concentrated so you don't need much.
customer_reviews.author: P. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great cost
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheaper alternate to Dreft and this has been great!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Lemieu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This detergent makes my hands really dry. Don’t know why it says its for baby.
customer_reviews.author: MamaY

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand - Mama Bear Gentle Baby Laundry Detergent, 95% Biobased, Fragrance Free, 40 Ounce (Pack of 2, 53 Loads Each)
product_meta.description: Style:Fragrance FreeMama Bear detergent solves life's little messes with smart product choices. Carefully designed with Baby’s needs in mind, our gentle liquid baby laundry detergent is specially formulated to remove baby food stains and be gentle on sensitive skin. Whether washing your cub’s clothing in hot or cold water, our four times concentrated formula cuts through stains. You can take comfort in knowing that our baby laundry detergent contains 95% USDA certified biobased content, is EPA Safer Choice approved, and never tested on animals.
feature_bullets: Two 40-fluid ounce bottles of gentle baby laundry detergent
Our 4x concentrated formula is a smart product choice at just $0.22 per load
Specially formulated for baby laundry with powerful stain-fighting enzymes to help fight stains
Gentle on sensitive skin; Free of phthalates, dyes, and fragrance
EPA Safer Choice approved; comprised of 95% USDA certified biobased ingredients
Cruelty free, never tested on animals
Satisfaction Guarantee: We're proud of our products. If you aren't satisfied, we'll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase. 1-877-485-0385
